ing: 1 (14 ounce) can water-packed artichoke hearts, rinsed, drained and quartered
1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained
des: "'I created this dish when I was trying to duplicate a very lemony Caesar salad,' recalls Kathleen Law of Pullman, Washington. 'I think my version is not only delicious but more healthful, too!'"
ins: In a bowl, combine first four ingredients. Combine water, lemon juice, oil, garlic, salt and pepper. Pour over salad; toss to coat. Sprinkle with cheese.
